description: This file initializes an Agent object with specific storage, knowledge base, and vector database configurations, then loads knowledge and makes a query to the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with storage, knowledge base, and vector database.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class that loads PDF URLs for the agent.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: Storage class for agent data using SQLite.

classes.name: Clickhouse
classes.description: Vector database class for Clickhouse integration.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown.
